all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Get thee hence, Satan; deceive me not; for God said unto me: Thou art after the similitude of mine Only Begotten.
Moses 1:16
Quote of the Day
"As the Lord hastens His work, we should love, nurture, and serve those who accept His gospel."
Elder Quentin L. Cook | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
